com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager.impl

Class JobJanitorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager.impl.JobJanitorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobJanitor, java.lang.Runnable

    @Named
 @Scope(value="prototype")
public class JobJanitorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobJanitor
    Janitor thread that marks jobs as zombies if status hasn't been updated for the configured timeout.
